ROOT.GetCurStationTypeStat: select type,sum(substation_capacity)/10.0,sum(transfm_num),sum(substation_num) from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_rpt_trans_s_year where sta_year=year(sysdate) group by type order by type
ROOT.GetCurPlantTypeStat: select type,sum(generator_capacity)/10.0,sum(generator_num),sum(plant_num) from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_rpt_gen_s_year where sta_year=year(sysdate) group by type
ROOT.GetGenStat: SELECT PLANT_TYPE,SYEAR,SMONTH,RCOUNT,ECOUNT FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_DEV_PLANT_S_GEN ORDER BY PLANT_TYPE,SYEAR,SMONTH
ROOT.GetTransStat: SELECT VOLTAGE_TYPE,SYEAR,SMONTH,RCOUNT,ECOUNT FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_dev_station_s_trans ORDER BY VOLTAGE_TYPE,SYEAR,SMONTH
ROOT.GetAllPlantList: SELECT A.ID,A.MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE,C.CAPACITY,A.CONNECTIVE_PG_ID,A.DCC_ID,A.OPERATE_DATE,A.LONGITUDE,A.LATITUDE,A.EXPIRY_DATE,A.OPERATE_STATE,A.PLANT_TYPE,A.NAME_ABBREVIATION FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B AS A LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_S AS C ON A.ID=C.ID AND C.VOLTAGE_TYPE=9999 AND C.STATE_CODE=1003
ROOT.GetAllStationList: SELECT A.ID,A.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE,C.transformation_capacity AS CAPACITY,A.PG_ID,A.DCC_ID,A.OPERATE_DATE,A.LONGITUDE,A.LATITUDE,A.EXPIRY_DATE,A.OPERATE_STATE,A.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE,A.NAME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B AS A LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_S AS C ON A.ID=C.ID AND C.VOLTAGE_TYPE=9999 UNION ALL SELECT A.ID,A.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE,C.transformation_capacity,A.PG_ID,A.DCC_ID,A.OPERATE_DATE,A.LONGITUDE,A.LATITUDE,A.EXPIRY_DATE,A.OPERATE_STATE,DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE,A.NAME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B AS A LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_S AS C ON A.ID=C.ID

dump.GetCurStationTypeStat: select type,sum(substation_capacity)/10.0,sum(transfm_num),sum(substation_num) from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_rpt_trans_s_year where sta_year=year(sysdate) group by type order by type
dump.GetThisYearTransStat: SELECT SMONTH,VOLTAGE_TYPE,RCOUNT FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_dev_station_s_trans WHERE SYEAR=YEAR(CAST({0} AS TIMESTAMP)) AND SMONTH<=MONTH(CAST({1} AS TIMESTAMP)) ORDER BY SMONTH
dump.GetThisYearTransStat1: select m,voltage_type as t,count(1) c from ( select month(operate_date) as m,voltage_type from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_pwrtransfm_b where operate_date>={0} and operate_date<={1} ) group by m,voltage_type order by m
dump.GetCurPlantTypeStat: select type,sum(generator_capacity)/10.0,sum(generator_num),sum(plant_num) from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_rpt_gen_s_year where sta_year=year(sysdate) group by type
dump.GetCurPlantTypeStat1: SELECT P.PLANT_TYPE,SUM(S.CAPACITY/10.0) AS CAP,SUM(S.GEN_COUNT) AS GEN,COUNT(1) AS PLANTS FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B P JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_S S ON P.ID=S.ID AND S.VOLTAGE_TYPE=9999 AND S.STATE_CODE=1003 WHERE P.OPERATE_STATE=1003 GROUP BY P.PLANT_TYPE
dump.GetThisYearGenStat: SELECT SMONTH,PLANT_TYPE,RCOUNT FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_DEV_PLANT_S_GEN WHERE SYEAR=YEAR(CAST({0} AS TIMESTAMP)) AND SMONTH<=MONTH(CAST({1} AS TIMESTAMP)) ORDER BY SMONTH
dump.GetThisYearGenStat1: select m,plant_type as t,count(1) c from ( select month(g.operate_date) as m,p.plant_type from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_generator_b g JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_con_plant_b p on g.st_id=p.id where g.operate_date>={0} and g.operate_date<={1} ) group by m,plant_type order by m
dump.GetThisYearTransCapStat: SELECT SMONTH,VOLTAGE_TYPE,RCAP/10.0 FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_dev_station_s_trans WHERE SYEAR=YEAR(CAST({0} AS TIMESTAMP)) AND SMONTH<=MONTH(CAST({1} AS TIMESTAMP)) ORDER BY SMONTH
dump.GetThisYearPlantCapStat: SELECT SMONTH,PLANT_TYPE,RCAP/10.0 FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_DEV_PLANT_S_GEN WHERE SYEAR=YEAR(CAST({0} AS TIMESTAMP)) AND SMONTH<=MONTH(CAST({1} AS TIMESTAMP)) ORDER BY SMONTH
